column2: "Oh, it's you. Have you heard that this place has been designated as a restricted area?"
"What? You were never contacted? That can't be, everyone was supposed to be notified."
"The Three Heroes are on orders to stand by, and other ARKS have been dispatched as a precaution."
"Incongruous principles and information, plus a lack of preparation, can lead to grave mistakes. It's not a good situation."
"But I suppose it's these cases when we need to exchange information, to try and make up for any shortcomings."
"When I was young, I neglected to confirm information, often leading to reckless engagements..."
